scripts.postinstall: npm run check:peer-deps && npm run check:typescript-project-references
scripts.reinstall: git checkout -- package-lock.json && npm run clean && npm install
scripts.coverage:report: shx mkdir -p ./test-results && npm run coverage:merge && nyc report --reporter=html --report-dir=./test-results/coverage-report --temp-dir=coverage
scripts.capture:results: shx mkdir -p ./test-results && npm run junit:report && npm run coverage:report
scripts.vscode:bundle: npm run vscode:bundle:debugger && npm run vscode:bundle:extension
scripts.vscode:package: npm run compile && npm run vscode:bundle && node ./scripts/capture-esbuild-warnings.js && lerna run vscode:package --concurrency 1
scripts.link-lsp: yarn link @salesforce/aura-language-server @salesforce/lwc-language-server @salesforce/lightning-lsp-common && lerna exec yarn link @salesforce/aura-language-server @salesforce/lwc-language-server @salesforce/lightning-lsp-common --scope salesforcedx-vscode-lightning && lerna exec yarn link @salesforce/lwc-language-server @salesforce/lightning-lsp-common --scope salesforcedx-vscode-lwc
scripts.unlink-lsp: yarn unlink @salesforce/aura-language-server @salesforce/lwc-language-server @salesforce/lightning-lsp-common && lerna exec yarn unlink @salesforce/aura-language-server @salesforce/lwc-language-server @salesforce/lightning-lsp-common --scope salesforcedx-vscode-lightning && lerna exec yarn unlink @salesforce/lwc-language-server @salesforce/lightning-lsp-common --scope salesforcedx-vscode-lwc
scripts.automation-test: rm -rf ./e2e-temp && npm install && npm run link-lsp && npm run compile && [ ! -d ./extensions ] && npm run vscode:package && npm run vsix:update-lwc && mkdir -p ./extensions && find ./packages -name '*.vsix' -exec cp {} ./extensions/ \; || true && VSIX_TO_INSTALL=./extensions node ./node_modules/@salesforce/salesforcedx-vscode-test-tools/lib/src/test-setup-and-runner.js --spec ./packages/salesforcedx-vscode-automation-tests/lib/test/specs/metadataDeployRetrieve.e2e.js

hooks.pre-commit: lerna run compile,lint && npm run check:peer-deps && npm run check:typescript-project-references && ts-node scripts/package-lock.validation.ts
